scripts.release:minor: changeset version --type=minor && npm version && git add . && git commit -m 'chore(release): version bump' && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:major: changeset version --type=major && npm version && git add . && git commit -m 'chore(release): version bump' && git push --follow-tags
scripts.release:patch: changeset version --type=patch && npm version && git add . && git commit -m 'chore(release): version bump' && git push --follow-tags
